summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for transportation charges incurred on July 3, 2001. The total amount due is $36.32, with details on discounts and payment instructions included.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A package was shipped via FedEx from New York to Milan, Italy, with charges totaling $36.32.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6809
keyFacts: The invoice is dated July 13, 2001, for services rendered on July 3, 2001.
The total charges for the FedEx services amount to $36.32.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the account holder for the FedEx services.
The invoice includes a discount of $1.08 applied to the total charges.
The invoice provides payment instructions and a due date of July 28, 2001.
